member.name: IUIAnimationTransitionFactory.CreateTransition
member.summary: Creates a transition from a custom interpolator.

param.name: interpolator
param.para: The interpolator from which a transition is to be created.
The specified object must implement the interface.

member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransitionFactory
member.summary: Defines a method for creating transitions from custom interpolators.
